amendment.description: Amendment clarifies that companies sharing cyber threat information with other companies cannot treat this sharing relationship as a loophole to sell a consumer's personal information for a marketing purpose.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 11 printed in House Report 113-41 to clarify that companies sharing cyber threat information with other companies cannot treat this sharing relationship as a loophole to sell a consumer's personal information for a marketing purpose.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Barton amendment (A009) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A009) offered by Mr. Barton.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Barton amendment (A009) Agreed to by voice vote.
